channel.title: Projects on Artur L Gower
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Artur L Gower

item.title: Multiple Scattering
item.description: I am currently working on multiply scattering in random media. See example video below! Back-scattering from a random arrangement of particles which is measured at the blue semi-circle.

item.title: Industrical Mathematics
item.description: img { float: right; } -- The projects here are come from commercial and industrial challenges. Tracking train tracks How to track a train using only a camera? We designed a method that extracts the curvature of the tracks and removes errors caused by the train jiggling. Designing a collection of cables How to design a collection of cables to be both robust and flexible?
